hero.title: Control Your
hero.subtitle: A modern GTK4 utility to monitor and switch CPU frequency scaling governors — fast, secure, and beautiful.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: A complete CPU management experience built for the modern Linux desktop.

items.title: Instant Switching
items.desc: Switch between Performance, Powersave, and other governors instantly with one click.

items.title: Real-Time Monitoring
items.desc: Watch live per-core CPU frequencies across all cores in real time.

items.title: Secure by Design
items.desc: Polkit authentication ensures the GUI never runs as root. Safe and standards-compliant.

items.title: Modern Interface
items.desc: Built with GTK4 + libadwaita for a native GNOME experience that feels right at home.

items.title: Multilanguage
items.desc: Available in English, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Chinese, and Italian.

items.title: Persistent Settings
items.desc: Your preferred governor is remembered and restored automatically on every boot.

download.title: Get CPU Governor
download.subtitle: Available on Flathub and as open source on GitHub.
download.flathubSub: The easiest way — universal Linux package
download.debSub: For Debian, Ubuntu, Parrot OS and more
download.requirements: Requires cpugov-daemon installed on host. See README for instructions.

install.title: Installation Guide
install.subtitle: Get CPU Governor running in under a minute.
install.step1Desc: CPU Governor requires a Polkit-secured system daemon to apply hardware changes safely without running the GUI as root.
install.step2Desc: The recommended way to install CPU Governor on any Linux distribution.
install.step3Desc: Native package for Debian-based distributions. Download the latest .deb release and install it via APT.
